page.title: 15CALLOW HILL VILLAGE REDDITCH
page.content: It is not very often that a completely new village is created,especially not in 1985,so {Callow Hill}village is a very special venture. The builders have also seen it as an opportunity to recreate an environment and a lifestyle which has many of the traditional values of an old fashioned village.It is not surprising then to see that they have chosen a village water pump as a symbol for{Callow Hill Other features being included are a paved square,with green,and adjacent shallow lake.At the centre of the village is a Victorian conservatory which will serve as a meeting place for the residents.The centre of the village follows the line of a valley,cottage and mews homes form the main street,with many private court- yards off it.It is a brave project and the end result should be interesting.
